description: Serve this smoky chicken soup with all your favourite Mexican toppings.
keywords: Chicken soup,Soy free,Wheat free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Tomato,Chicken,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Mexican Style Chicken Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bring 500ml of water to the boil in a large saucepan, add the stock cube and cook for 2 minutes, stirring, until dissolved. Reduce the heat and add the chicken breasts. Simmer gently for 10 minutes until the chicken is cooked, remove from the pan with a slotted spoon and set aside to cool slightly. Reserve the stock.

Once the chicken is cool enough to handle, shred it with two forks and set aside in a bowl. Heat the oil in a large pan on medium high heat and cook the onion for 3 minutes, add the capsicum and cook for 3 more minutes to soften. Stir in the garlic, smoked paprika and cumin and cook for 1 minute, stirring.
Pour over the chopped tomatoes, black beans (including the liquid) and half the stock. Add half the lime juice and simmer, uncovered for 15-20 minutes until thick and reduced.
Toss the chicken with half the chopped coriander and remaining lime juice. Pour the soup into bowls, top with the chicken and chopped coriander and serve.
